page_content:
2021 CSR REPORT | 22FINANCIAL INCLUSION  
New Checking Account – Key Features
Transaction Account at Insured  
Depository InstitutionChecking account (including checkless checking) 
or bank- or credit union-offered prepaid
Debit Card Debit card network (e.g., Visa, Mastercard,  
Discover) for point of sale and bill payment; free
Minimum Opening Deposit $25 or less
Monthly Maintenance Fee If not waivable: $5 or less 
If waivable: $10 or less; offer at least two options 
to waive fee entirely with a single transaction  
(e.g., direct deposit with no minimum deposit,  
online bill pay, or debit card purchase)
Overdraft or Non-Sufficient Funds (NSF) Fees None
Account Activation, Closure, Dormancy,  
Inactivity, and Low Balance FeesNone
